products.name: Canon EOS R5 C Mirrorless Cinema Camera
products.description: Cinematic Capture in a Compact, Streamlined Form With a compact design for solo shooters, for travel applications, and to serve as an ideal B cam, the Sony FX3 borrows from both the Cinema Line and Alpha series of cameras to create an optimized portable cinema camera. The FX3 features all the imaging attributes you'd expect from this class but sports a new lightweight, handheld form with a streamlined profile and a 'cage-free' design offering the ability to secure various accessories directly to the camera body.

products.name: Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM Lens
products.description: Professional-grade prime lens with ultra-wide aperture for stunning bokeh and low-light performance.

products.name: Sony FE 24-70mm f/2.8 GM II
products.description: Versatile zoom lens for full-frame Sony cameras, ideal for photography and videography.

products.name: Aputure 300D Mark II LED Light
products.description: Bright 300W LED light with high CRI for professional video and photography lighting.

products.name: Godox SL60W Bi-Color LED Video Light
products.description: 60W bi-color LED light with adjustable color temperature from 3200K to 5600K.

products.name: Neewer 660 LED Video Light Panel
products.description: Bright 660 LED light panel with adjustable brightness and color temperature.

products.name: SmallRig RC 120B LED Light
products.description: Compact and powerful 120W LED light with high CRI for on-the-go shooting.
